Text: RE Dinner Monday April Cc We are working on my flights and will get back to you shortly Thanks David B Aronoff t x General Partner f Greylock Partners w wwwgreylockcom One Federal Street e Boston MA Original Message From mailto Sent Wednesday April PM To Cc Subject Dinner Monday April Importance High Gentlemen Messrs Micheal Holthouse and Matt Khourie Jeffs cohosts of the April YPO event invite you to join them at dinner on Monday evening April Reservations have been made in Matt Khouries name at Capital Grille located at Westheimer Road in the Galleria area at pm Should you need transportation to the restaurant I will be happy to make those arrangements for you Please send me a note confirming your attendance at this dinner I look forward to hearing from you Regards Sherri Sera Assistant to Jeff Skilling fax Aronoff David Emailvcf
